TopicTitle: How to tell if any parts in ship in the editor

Articles.Content:
Subject says it all.  I'm doing some work on HoloDeck (may release it eventually under a different name at original author's request).  I need to know if, while in the editor, there is anything there.

The docs are not obvious.

Thanks

I've found by poking around that EditorLogic.SortedShipList has only the parts attached to the ship in the editor - so far this has worked for me. If you find different I'd be interested in hearing about it.
